McCain ( DDG 56 ) participated in a goodwill cultural exchange at the Inasho Elementary School and Inozawa Elementary School in Shimoda May 16 as part of a port visit to join the city in celebrating the 75th annual Black Ship Festival .

SHIMODA , Japan - Sailors assigned to the Arleigh Burke - class guided - missile destroyers USS Mustin ( DDG 89 ) and USS John S. McCain ( DDG 56 ) participated in a goodwill cultural exchange at the Inasho Elementary School and Inozawa Elementary School in Shimoda May 16 as part of a port visit to join the city in celebrating the 75th annual Black Ship Festival .
Mustin Sailors were greeted by staff and students at the school where they took part in classroom games and activities followed by a school lunch with the students .
Mustin Sailors were greeted by staff and students at the school where they took part in classroom games and activities followed by a school lunch with the students .

John S. McCain Sailors introduced themselves to the staff and students in the school 's gymnasium , then played a traditional game of Japanese rock , paper , scissors before moving on to individual classrooms for Origami .

This work , John S. McCain , Mustin Sailors ecchange culture with Shimoda Elementary Schools , by PO3 Kevin Cunningham , identified by DVIDS , is free of known copyright restrictions under U.S. copyright law .
